_header: Thy life it is a law of death
_description: A translation of Latin death lyrics, ‘Vita qua vivis lex mortis iudicii vis / Vita otata rosis brevis est mala plena dolosis’ in a sermon exemplum — one quatrain (abcb)

BodeMus180.Transcription:
Thy lyfe it is a law of detheA strengthe of dome the to
                    begyleFfygurde be these rosis reddIt is full ivill and lastythe but a
                    whyle

Fletcher,  Alan J. 
             “Death Lyrics from Two Fifteenth-Century Sermon Manuscripts.”
